application.name: catoriglab
application.brief: Outputs the original labels of a cube
application.description: This program will output the full labels from the original source.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input file from which to extract the labels
parameter.description: The cube file from which to extract the original labels.

example.brief: Full printout of the original labels in a cub

terminalInterface.description: Run the catoriglab application on a .cub file.
